profile.name: Ray
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | raylibtech
profile.summary: Highly skilled videogames developer with expertise in game project templates, Lua libraries, C libraries for physics and graphics, and custom game engines. Proven track record of contributing to the development of popular videogames libraries like raylib.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained game project templates for raylib, ensuring seamless integration with various game engines.
Contributed to the development of raylib, a popular videogames library used by thousands of developers worldwide.
Reviewed pull requests from other developers to ensure high-quality code and maintain the integrity of the library.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom game engines for clients, utilizing expertise in Lua libraries and C libraries for physics and graphics.
Created game project templates for various clients, ensuring efficient development and deployment of games.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained the raylib repository, ensuring timely updates and bug fixes.
Contributed to the development of new features and improved performance for the library.

experience.title: Game Project Developer
description: Developed games using raylib, utilizing expertise in game project templates and Lua libraries.
Collaborated with game developers to ensure seamless integration of raylib into their projects.

Database Operations: Database sharding (relevant to file system operations)
GUI Development: Reviewing pull requests related to GUI development (e.g., `rconpacker`)
